name: Vampires!
description: An interesting puzzle with an unusual idea. Play as a hunter for human lives and help feed your pet. In this case, try not to perish yourself.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: any
